title: /fmt.a: not a package file
body:
Just new learner for Go, I tried to import only "fmt" then it works fine. 
however, if I import  "fmt" and such as example of "How to Write Go code" and always has this error

"./hello.go:4: import $GOPATH/pkg/linux_amd64/fmt.a: not a package file"

still not able to find out what the problem will be?

"How to Write Go code" example :
=================================================
package main
import (
	"fmt"
	"github.com/user/stringutil"
)
func main() {
	fmt.Printf(stringutil.Reverse("!oG ,olleH"))
}
